Kennewick.Columbia Park (Kennewick):
For other places known as Columbia Park, see Columbia Park (disambiguation).

Columbia Park is a 400-acre (160 ha) recreational area with 4.5 miles (7.2 km) of shoreline of the Columbia River located in the city of Kennewick in the U.S. state of Washington. The park is a popular destination for residents of the surrounding area because of the many facilities and events at the park.
